In a message dated 5/27/2005 1:19:42 PM Central Standard Time,
SandraDodd@... writes:

There's nothing really dramatic here, but I found a few things. It's very

without bringing up a ton of porn site links.





~~~
Yeah, and remember when one of HEM's URLs was co-opted by some offshore porn

Karen

messages.subject: other porn&boys stuff (but not much)
messages.msgSnippet: There s nothing really dramatic here, but I found a few  things.  It s very hard to look on google for info about homeschoolers,  boys, internet or porn
messages.messageBody:
There's nothing really dramatic here, but I found a few things. It's very
hard to look on google for info about homeschoolers, boys, internet or porn
without bringing up a ton of porn site links.



TANGLED IN THE PORN WEB—Pornography sales now exceed $10 billion annually in
the U.S. and $56 billion over the world. Porn use—specifically Internet porn—
is on the rise and is claiming a high price: lost jobs, failed marriages,
and destroyed families. Pastors and other Christian leaders are no less
vulnerable to this addiction (3/5 C. Today). In August 1999, 11 percent of the calls
received on Focus on the Family's Pastoral Care Line were about pastors and
online porn. In August 2000, online porn worries prompted 20 percent of the
calls. Almost 10 percent of calls are from women. Many female sex addicts get
hooked through X-rated chatrooms. Pornography has become one of the most
profitable ventures on the Internet with obscene profits soaring.

_http://home.hiwaay.net/~contendr/2001/3-15-2001.html_
(http://home.hiwaay.net/~contendr/2001/3-15-2001.html)

(From "Calvary Contender," a stupid site about stupidity, but still, worth
quoting on this, because IF pastors and Christian leaders are vulnerable to
this "addiction," there's something my teenagers have in their lives, some
strength or wholeness, that those grown men with wives and children are wholly
missing.)

--------

From Family Education
_http://familyeducation.com/article/1,1120,5-17313,00.html_
(http://familyeducation.com/article/1,1120,5-17313,00.html)

Part 2 of something I can't find Part 1 of.


-------------

_MotheringDotCommune Forums - Internet Porn and teenage boys_
(http://www.mothering.com/discussions/showthread.php?t=232027&page=2)
... I would never offer advice on this, you have to do what's right for
your ... I would NOT be cool with the online porn thing AT ALL-- if it were
say, ...
www.mothering.com/discussions/ showthread.php?t=232027&page=2 - 139k -

If anyone's on that forum, you might go look. I wasn't let in and don't
want to sign on.
